title: Impulse Tester
description: Specializes in testing inter-layer short circuits in motors, transformers, and inductors, and supports various test modes including area ratio, area difference, corona number, and corona amount.

title: Impedance Analyzer
description: High-precision analyzers featuring a user-friendly graphical interface, high-resolution color display, 0.05% basic accuracy, a minimum frequency of 20Hz, and a maximum frequency of up to 120MHz.

title: High Frequency LCR Meter
description: The 6500P series LCR meters feature extended test frequencies, high accuracy, and a large, high-resolution color display.

title: High Frequency DC Bias
description: The 6565 DC Bias Units are used to evaluate components at currents up to 80A and are compatible with the Wayne Kerr 6500B and 6500P models of precision analyzers.

title: Precision Component Analyzer
description: The 6400 Series provides thorough and accurate testing of any passive component with market-leading accuracy.

title: High Current Test System LCR Meter
description: High-current inductance testing systems with external DC bias up to 300A, 0.05% basic accuracy, a frequency range of 10Hz to 10MHz, and the capability for simultaneous multi-parameter measurements.

title: LCR Meters
description: User-friendly LCR meters with extensive functions for accurate, fast measurements from 20Hz to 1MHz, ideal for various test and production environments.

title: DC Bias Current Unit
description: Enable high current component evaluation with the Wayne Kerr 3255B Inductance Analyzer or 3260B Precision Magnetics Analyzer, offering bias current settings from 25mA to 25A in 25mA steps.

title: Precision Magnetics Analyzer
description: Provides comprehensive magnetic component analysis up to 3MHz, including true 4-terminal primary to secondary parameters, through 8 front panel BNCs.

title: Inductance Analyzer
description: Versatile and accurate inductance analyzers designed for straightforward device characterization.

title: Hi-Pot Tester
description: 3-in-1 tester combines AC/DC/IR withstand voltage tests with AC settings of 0.10 to 5000V and 0.10mA to 15.00mA, DC settings of 0 to 6000V and 0.10mA to 7.50mA.

title: Micro-Ohm Meter
description: Measures resistance from 0.001 mΩ to 1.999 MΩ with ±0.1% accuracy and features a four-wire test system with RS232/HANDLER interface.

title: 80Amp DC Bias Test System
description: The 6500 System is engineered to support DC bias currents up to 80A. With options for extending capabilities through parallel connection of additional 6565B bias units, the 6500 System offers scalable solutions tailored to meet advanced testing needs.

title: 400A DC Bias Test System
description: 5400/3265 400A DC bias system with 1mS ultra-fast measurement speed, basic accuracy up to 0.02%, AC parametric measurement up to 10MHz, providing 5Vrms/200mA powerful AAC signal drive, it is an efficient and accurate test solution.

title: 300A DC Bias Test System
description: The equipment includes 12 units of 3265B with 500 kHz measurement at 300A, 10 units of 3265B with 1 MHz measurement at 250A, and 2 units of 3265BQ with 3 MHz measurement at 50A, all featuring a 7-inch WVGA touchscreen for ease of use.

title: CLR Measurements
description: The DB23x Series provides precise and rapid testing of capacitors, including film/foil, tantalum, and ceramic types, with unique double frequency testing and high-speed sorting capabilities. Ideal for both laboratory and industrial use, these instruments ensure high-quality output and efficient operations.

title: Insulation Measurement
description: The DB26X Series Megohmmeters offer fast and precise measurement of leakage currents and insulation resistance, featuring dual high-voltage power supplies for efficient pre-charge and fine-charge cycles. Ideal for testing up to 5kV, they enhance sorting machine performance and are versatile for both industrial and laboratory use.

title: High Voltage Insulation Measurement
description: The JP3X Series High Voltage Insulation Testers offer non-destructive testing up to 36kV, identifying insulation weaknesses and faults without damaging components. Ideal for testing cables, generators, and electrical motors, these testers detect ionization through sound signals.

title: 3rd Harmonic Testing
description: The CLT10 System ensures component reliability by measuring 3rd harmonic distortion of a sinewave current, providing fast and effective quality control. It is suitable for testing metal-film resistors, capacitors, and audio-grade components, and meets international standards like IEC-440.
